```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```


```{r}
pres_ies <- read_csv("~/code/ddhq/pres_ies_2024.csv")
```
```{r}
write_csv(pres_ies %>% 
  mutate(week = week(dissemination_date), month = month(dissemination_date)) %>% 
  group_by(month) %>% 
  summarise(total = sum(amount)) %>% 
  arrange(month), "ies_month.csv")
  
```

```{r}
pth <- read_csv("~/code/ddhq/protect_the_house.csv")

pth <- pth %>% mutate(cand_district = sprintf("%02d", candidate_office_district))

pth <- pth %>% mutate(cd = paste0(recipient_state,'-',cand_district))

totals <- pth %>% 
  group_by(cd) %>% 
  summarise(total = sum(disbursement_amount)) 

write_csv(totals, "pth_totals.csv")

```
